comment: Roasted corn, butter and vanilla on the nose and smooth palate. Medium finish with a hint of buttered corn and a bit of peppery spice.
Reminds me of a good moonshine. Just lower abv and a bit more smooth. Corn forward as expected, sweet, and finishes clean.

Lots of butter popcorn as expected from an almost pure corn whiskey. Not a ton of finish. A momentary pleasure. Not a lot of detractors, but not a lot of memories, either. Prefer the balconies corn whiskeys to this one.
